item.title: Node JS Jokebot
item.description: Learning Node JS I’ve started playing about with Node JS to learn it enough to modify some legacy Lambda code. One of the tasks I set myself was to write a Joke bot for Mastodon, which work out to be fairly easy with a couple of packages got and masto. Dad Joke Bot the code is only 32 lines long, looking to expand it to be able to post images as well.
